## VirtualEditPopupComponent class

Component used for rendering virtual edit popup with options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class VirtualEditPopupComponent extends EditPopupComponent implements VirtualEditPopup, NgSelectPlugin<VirtualEditPopupOptions> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> EditPopupComponent

<b>Implements:</b> [VirtualEditPopup](./select-material.virtualeditpopup.md)<!-- -->, NgSelectPlugin&lt;[VirtualEditPopupOptions](./select-material.virtualeditpopupoptions.md)<!-- -->&gt;
